cool shit even though it was carrying around bit of extra pudge some faded stretch marks and some loose skin it also helped the muscles come alive again and it fun as hell after while decided that was going to pierce my belly button as way to adorn my stomach it sounds cheesy but kinda felt like it deserved something pretty after all put it through having two kids several miscarriages and stillbirth in five year period that helped too nice sparkly blue stone shining back at me from the mirror in dance class cheered me up it been five more years my kids are 11 and my body has bounced back almost completely still have faded stretch marks and my section scar is still visible and still carrying around the last 10 lbs of baby weight but do want to lose it because need it was underweight before having kids and paranoid about winding up there again cuz it sucks nobody told me how long it would take or how much work it would end up being mostly you just hear that it never going to happen so just give up interspersed with bitchy fitness model and have seventeen kids what your excuse blog posts not helpful you can get back in shape you just have to be patient with yourself and put in long hours of effort it can be one of your favourite body parts again quite happy with mine now no longer need to encourage myself to embrace it finally have some visible abs again but it took years for me to get here it would have taken less time if been more disciplined person probably but not so here we are anyway think lot of our struggle comes from the idea that anything other than airbrushed fake perfection is flaw guess what though we are the lucky ones who get to build another human being with our bodies that so fucking *boss* those stretch marks are flaw they re evidence that our bodies did something incredible and endured it and healed themselves afterwards the sagging skin is flaw it supposed to do that that what skin does when it stretches out to accommodate new life the extra weight is flaw that what bodies do when we re pregnant we need the extra weight to stay healthy it good thing the weak muscles are flaw they are the normal result of your abdominal wall wrapping around burgeoning uterus none of these things we hate about ourselves are flaws they re evidence that our bodies did something awesome that only women bodies get to do flaws hell no marks of badassery evidence of deep love and sacrifice nothing flawed about that perfection is overrated all the images of perfect bodies are inaccurate even the most beautiful bodies
